hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: ASSET_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: アセットのバージョン（アプリ側と共通）

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: [$class: 'GitSCM', branches: [[name: "$BRANCH"]], extensions: [ [$class: 'CloneOption', timeout: 60], [$class: 'CheckoutOption', timeout: 60] ], gitTool: 'Default', userRemoteConfigs: [[credentialsId: "$GIT_CREDENTIAL", url: "$GIT_URL"]] ]

[$class: 'GitSCM', branches: [[name: "$BRANCH"]], extensions: [ [$class: 'CloneOption', timeout: 60], [$class: 'CheckoutOption', timeout: 60] ], gitTool: 'Default', userRemoteConfigs: [[credentialsId: "$GIT_CREDENTIAL", url: "$GIT_URL"]] ]

":toolbox::tada:*アセットビルド成功 [$JOB_NAME:$BUILD_ID]*:tada:
$BUILD_URL
ユーザー : $USERNAME
AssetVer : $ASSET_VERSION / branch : $BRANCH"

":toolbox::skull:*アセットビルド失敗 [$JOB_NAME:$BUILD_ID]*:skull:
$BUILD_URL
ユーザー : $USERNAME
AssetVer : $ASSET_VERSION / branch : $BRANCH"

":toolbox::construction:*アセットビルド中断 [$JOB_NAME:$BUILD_ID]*:construction:
$BUILD_URL
ユーザー : $USERNAME
AssetVer : $ASSET_VERSION / branch : $BRANCH"

flow-build.description: サーバー種別：Test S3Address: s3://p3-alpha.coconeimg.jp/asset/test
